name: isHttpMethod
description:
Tests if a value is a `HttpMethod`.
*Example
documentation:
Tests if a value is a `HttpMethod`.
*Example**

```ts
import { HttpMethod } from "@effect/platform"

console.log(HttpMethod.isHttpMethod("GET"))
// true
console.log(HttpMethod.isHttpMethod("get"))
// false
console.log(HttpMethod.isHttpMethod(1))
// false
```
